app_desc: Learn English, one keystroke at a time, open-source word and article practice tool
home_word_practice_desc2: Smart learning: Intelligent planning for review
home_word_practice_desc3: Free learning: No restrictions, plan yourself
home_article_practice_desc1: Built-in common books, add articles yourself
home_collection_desc1: Wrong input auto added to wrong word book
home_collection_desc2: Add to mastered, auto skip later
home_design_desc3: No forced following of any platform
tap_allow_in_wechat: Tap allow in WeChat to login
data_saved_locally: All data saved locally in browser
import_warning: Import will overwrite all current data, proceed with caution
select_dict_to_start: Please select a dictionary to start
question: Question
where_is_data: Where is data? How to use across devices?
resources_from_internet: All resources are collected from the internet, for learning only
about_thanks: Thank you for using this project! It is open source and free. If helpful, please star us on GitHub. Your support motivates our improvement!
wait_translation: Please wait for translation to complete
migrate_new_domain: This website has enabled a new domain
migrate_old_domain_notice: The old domain will be discontinued. Due to browser security restrictions, data cannot be shared between old and new sites. Please click to transfer data manually.
migrate_later_notice: If you don't want to migrate now, you can do it later in "Settings" -> "Data Management"
author: Author:
xiaohongshu_desc: Follow us on Xiaohongshu to get the latest updates from the development team, share your feedback and suggestions, help us improve the product, and stay updated with our latest news.
community_desc: Join our community to communicate with the development team, share your experience and suggestions, help us improve the product, and stay updated with our latest news.
ie_use_modern_browser: Type Words is built with modern technology. Please use Chrome, Edge, Firefox, or Safari.
ignore_case_desc: When enabled, input is case-insensitive. Both "hello" and "Hello" are considered correct.
allow_dictation_tip_desc: When enabled, you can hover over words or press shortcut key to show the answer
simple_word_filter_desc: When enabled, simple words will be excluded from practice and article word count
pronunciation_accent_desc: Only for words, articles use US accent
show_prev_next_word_desc: When enabled, previous/next word will be shown above during practice
disable_practice_setting_dialog: Don't show practice settings by default
disable_practice_setting_dialog_desc: Whether to show practice settings dialog when clicking learn button on dictionary page
review_ratio_desc: Review to new word ratio, takes effect on next session
auto_next_word_desc: Only works in follow-typing mode. For dictation/test/recitation, press spacebar to switch
auto_next_word_time_desc: Time before auto-switching to next word after correct input
review_ratio_notice_1: During learning, review count follows the ratio setting. 0 means no review.
review_ratio_notice_2: After completion, new words are 0, review count follows ratio (min 1).
import_follow_template: Please follow the template format to fill in data
import_word_required: Word field is required, others are optional
import_translation_hint: Translation: one per line, part of speech first, then content (e.g. n.cancel); multiple translations on separate lines
import_example_hint: Example: original on one line, translation on next; multiple entries need
import_phrase_hint: Phrase: original on one line, translation on next; multiple entries need
import_other_hint: Synonyms, related words, etymology: check official dictionary and edit a word to see the format
conflict_notice_title: If you encounter the following issues:
check_plugins_installed: Please check if you have installed
plugins_intercept_keyboard: or similar plugins/scripts that intercept keyboard events,
cause_no_response: causing keys not to respond on this site
try_incognito_mode: Open this site in incognito mode, check if you can type normally?
feedback_or_wechat: to report, or join WeChat group:
incognito_working: If incognito works, then a plugin/script is causing the conflict
disable_plugin_or_exclude: Temporarily disable the plugin/script, or exclude this site in its settings
delete_key_goes_back: Delete key goes back to previous page
browser_360_shortcut: In 360 Browser, "delete key goes back" is set by default
change_browser_or_shortcut: Either change browser or remove the shortcut: search "back" in browser settings and delete the shortcut
edit_and_add_to_dict: Modified and added to my dictionary
please_fill_complete: Please fill in all required fields
name: Name
exam_color_hint: Light red: wrong, Dark red: not selected, Green: correct
please_fill_original: Please fill in the original text!
title: Title
one_sentence_per_line: One sentence per line, empty line between paragraphs
name_config_tip: Names will be auto-ignored during practice (optional, enabled by default)
copy_and_split: Copy original text, then split sentences
split_rule: Split rule: one sentence per line, empty line between paragraphs
sync_to_result: button to sync to result panel
editable_auto_sync: All editable, click Apply to sync after editing
audio_timeline_tutorial: Tutorial: Click play, when sentence starts click Record for start time; when sentence ends click Record for end time, then preview
audio_upload_notice:
1. Uploaded files are saved locally, data will be lost when changing computers, please backup
2. LRC files are used to parse audio positions, may not be accurate, can be modified later
name_ignore_config_desc: Configure names to ignore during practice (optional, enabled by default)
encouragement_default: Every practice is progress, keep going!
know_word_tip: If you selected "I know" by mistake, press Delete to reselect!
agree_terms_notice: By continuing, you agree to our
qa1_q1: Not completely free. For long-term development, future charges are inevitable, but it will not require payment to use. We try to find a balance between free and paid.
qa1_q2: The project is open source, you can deploy it yourself.
qa2_a: Cannot type, keyboard has no response?
qa3_a: Where is the data? How to use across multiple computers/devices?
qa3_q1: All user data is saved in the local browser. If you need to use Type Words on different devices or browsers, you need to manually export and import data.
qa3_q2: Settings -> Data Settings -> Export data on original computer -> Send to new computer via social software -> Import on new computer
qa4_a: The website plans too many words automatically, how to modify?
qa4_q1: The default ratio of review words to new words is 1:4. If there are 40 new words, it will review 40 words from the last session and 120 words from previous sessions.
qa4_q2: You can modify it via Settings -> Word Settings -> Review Ratio
qa5_a: It takes too long to complete one learning session, is the process too lengthy?
qa5_q1: This is indeed an issue. A lengthy process can easily make people lose motivation. I am thinking about how to optimize the learning process.
qa5_q2: Wrong words will be repeated. If it was just a typo, you can press Tab to skip during subsequent practice.
qa5_q3: During review, only words marked as "don't know" require dictation and spelling.
qa5_q4: After the account system is launched, the Ebbinghaus memory curve feature will be added.
qa6_a: Will the Ebbinghaus memory curve feature be added?
qa7_a: Can I add words/custom dictionaries/import my own words/modify word content?
qa7_q1: Yes, on the Words page, click "Create Personal Dictionary"
qa7_q2: After creation, on the dictionary details page, click the "Add Word" icon to add your own words
qa7_q3: You can also click the "Import" icon to batch import (must strictly follow the template xlsx format)
qa8_a: Can I add articles/custom books/import my own articles/modify article content?
qa8_q1: Yes, the steps are basically the same as adding words
qa8_q2: On the Articles page, click "Create Personal Book"
qa8_q3: After creation, click the "Article Management" button at the top to add your own articles
qa9_a: How to turn off key sounds?
qa9_q: Settings -> General Settings -> Sound Effects -> Key Sound, turn it off
qa10_a: Can I use it on a tablet?
qa10_q1: Tablets can be used, but using a Bluetooth keyboard provides a better experience since the built-in virtual keyboard takes up 1/3 of the screen space.
qa10_q2: After connecting a Bluetooth keyboard, Android tablets need to manually enable "Desktop Mode" in the browser; iPad does not need this operation.
qa11_a: Can I use it on a phone?
qa11_q: Phones can be used, but optimization for phones has not been done yet. It is recommended to use on a computer or tablet.
qa12_a: Is there an APP or mini-program?
qa13_a: How to provide feedback to the development team?
qa13_q1: You can join our official WeChat group, describe in detail the features you want
qa13_q2: If you find bugs in the application, please provide a detailed description and steps to reproduce, preferably with a short video
qa13_q3: You can also submit a support ticket to us
qa13_q4: You can also submit on github/issues
